name: Rose
description: Rose petals suitable for medicinal purposes must yield a deep rose-colored, astringent, and fragrant infusion when boiling water is poured upon them.

name: Osmanthus
description: Warms stomach, improves digestion, treats intestinal diseases and reduces the amount of stomach gas.

name: Jasmine
description: Breathing in the scent of jasmine has the power to release feel-good brain chemicals that boost energy as well as reduce anxiety.
